word.name: greet
word.definition: 1. to say hello to someone or welcome them;2. to react to something in a particular way;3. to be the first thing you see or hear when you arrive somewhere

word.name: particular
word.definition: 1. a particular thing or person is the one that you are talking about, and not any other;2. special or great;3. very careful about choosing exactly what you like and not easily satisfied

word.name: subscribe
word.definition: 1. to pay money, usually once a year, to have copies of a newspaper or magazine sent to you, or to have some other service;2. to pay money regularly to be a member of an organization or to help its work;3. to agree to buy or pay for share(s);4.;5.;6.;7.;8.;9.;0.;10
